title: What are the most interesting topics in the fields of the study of phenomenology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Phenomenology arose to ask questions about reality that science only answers. Here are some of these questions: 1) Because phenomenology does not seek to understand illusions, but instead considers them as real as non-illusions. 2) Consciousness, with its essential structure, intentionality has the objective of experiencing reality and giving meanings or has only an evolutionary function with the senses. 3) What is transcendental subjectivity that Husserl sought so much.
